Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Shepard v. Chadderton Trucking, Appellant.
Argued October 5, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

Bernard Goldstone, with him Boutman, Moore, Goldstone & Valentino, for appellee.
January 7, 1971:
